alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 12:09PM PST until January 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 12 inches below 9000 feet. 1 to 3 feet above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult or impossible. Areas of reduced visibility due to blowing snow. High winds and heavy snow could result in increased avalanche danger.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
